quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. Your first objective is to go to the north. Then, try to travel east. And then, go north. And then, make an attempt to head north. And then, take a trip west. After that, travel south. After that, make an effort to take a trip west. Then, venture south. And then, make an attempt to travel south. Once you accomplish that, attempt to go west. And then, head north. Then, make an effort to venture west. And then, make an attempt to head north. And then, recover the laptop from the recliner within the chamber. That's it!

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You have come into a cubicle. Not the cubicle you'd expect. No, this is a cubicle. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You make out a cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The cabinet is empty![end if] Hey, want to see a desk? Look over there, a desk. The desk is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_0] On the desk you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The desk appears to be empty. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] You can make out a stand. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a shower. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_2]On the bench you make out [a list of things on the s_2]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]However, the bench, like an empty bench, has nothing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a playroom. An usual kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a bed. The bed is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the bed you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You arrive in a laundromat. A typical kind of place.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You arrive in a sauna. A normal one. You begin looking for stuff.

 You see a board. The board is normal.[if there is something on the s_4] On the board you can see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] The board appears to be empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a vault. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You are in a launderette. An ordinary one.

 Look over there! a table. The table is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_5] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You've entered a recreation zone.

 You can make out a bed stand. The bed stand is normal.[if there is something on the s_6] On the bed stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Silly bed stand, silly, empty, good for nothing bed stand.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You've entered a laundry place. You start to take note of what's in the room.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
This scullery you have just entered is definitely ordinary. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the cellar.

 You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] trunk.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] display right there by you.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The display contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest, which looks standard, in the room.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_7] On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the counter.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bathroom. An ordinary kind of place.

 You see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser, which looks typical, in the corner.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You're now in a steam room. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You are in a workshop. A typical kind of place.

 You make out a mantle. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a mantle, go to TextWorld. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the mantle.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You think about smashing the mantle to bits, throwing the bits into the garbage, etc, until you get bored.[end if] Oh, great. Here's an armchair. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The armchair is standard.[if there is something on the s_9] On the armchair you see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You are in a garage. An ordinary kind of place. Let's see what's in here.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You arrive in a studio. A typical kind of place.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.desc:
You find yourself in a washroom. A normal one. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.desc:
You find yourself in a chamber. An usual one.

 You can see a locker.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a recliner. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the recliner.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But the thing is empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You arrive in a basement. An ordinary one.

 You see a crate. Huh, weird.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_6]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The crate is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see a shelf. [if there is something on the s_11]On the shelf you see [a list of things on the s_11].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Silly shelf, silly, empty, good for nothing shelf.[end if] You can see a workbench. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_12]On the workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_12].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_12]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You're now in a restroom. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: display
infos.desc: The display looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: chest
infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: dresser
infos.desc: The dresser looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: locker
infos.desc: The locker looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: crate
infos.desc: The crate looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The fondue looks appealing.

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First off, go to the north. After that, go east. And then, make an effort to travel north. With that over with, try to move north. Once you succeed at that, travel west. Then, venture south. Then, make an effort to venture west. That done, make an effort to head south. After that, try to travel south. After that, go west. Then, try to move north. After that, venture west. Then, travel north. And then, pick up the laptop from the recliner inside the chamber. Got that? Good!
